name: 2945VR Demo
description:
Game:

2945 is a fast-paced shooting game.
that allows you to control your combat aircraft for fighting using your game pad.

In the game, you can use time slots to activate bullet-time to avoid enemy attacks


Bullet time(Press the pad to activate)

Endless mode

Top score in challenge ranking
